summary: a litle recolord i made of the dragon i wanted to make a feathered dragon
descriptionHtml:
a litle recolord i made for a dragon .
I wanted to make a feathered dragon but i dont have the time to add it in game, nor i know scripting to make the celestian dragons behave as i woude like  feel [url=#]free[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] to recolor it and use it anywere just give me credit for the original textures  and plz excuse my english its not my first language
author: milisot1325
